alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Hamilton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 5:49PM CDT until May 19 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Hamilton County in central Texas... Southeastern Comanche County in central Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 549 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Hamilton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Gentrys Mill, Lamkin, Fairy and Olin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
